message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I think it's a fantastic deal and will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $200 is already a very competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
